title: Chicken Piccata with Artichokes
ingredients: ['100g plain flour', '1/8 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon Italian herb seasoning', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, pounded 1cm thick and cut into thirds', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 onion, minced', '125ml white wine', '400ml chicken stock', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 (400g) tin artichoke hearts, drained and chopped, liquid reserved', '4 tablespoons capers, with liquid', '30g butter']
